Squizzy::

She was about to jump right out of her skin with excitement. "Yes, Of 
course I'll go with you. I'd love to learn how this is all 
accomplished."

Then she thought about Zardus,"But, would Zardus give us the 
permission to leave right now?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Lady Hawk studied the printouts, they were exactly what Veratis 
might 
> need.
> 
> "The wild animals have thier own DNA structures. wild creatures 
can't 
> be combined as easily as already simulated ones. For instance the 
> cells of translife can be combined and added to a protoform without 
> the risk of the cells rejecting each other." Lady Hawk paused 
> wondering if it was her imagination or was Squizzy asking all these 
> questions to steal her experiment.
> 
> "I know a place where I can give you a better example." she thought 
> about Zardus' expression if he learned that they'd walked out on 
> him."If you'd like to go with me."
>
